text: Firsat Sofi Ali (, 21 May 1978 â€“ 18 November 2020) was an Iraqi Kurdish politician. He was a member of the Kurdistan Democratic Party (KDP). He was born in Gazna village in Choman District.Kurdistan-parliament,. Firsat was the Erbil governor from 2019 until his death.Former MP Firsat Sofi elected first new Erbil governor in 15 years, Rudaw Media Network, published on 12-09-2019.Iraq: Erbil governor contracts coronavirus, Anadolu Agency, retrieved on 18th Nov 2020. Sofi died on 18 November 2020 in Ankara, Turkey from COVID-19 at the age of 42.ERBIL GOVERNOR FIRSAT SOFI DIES AT 42 IN HOSPITAL IN TURKEY , NRT, Published on 18th Nov 2020 ==References== Category:1978 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Ankara Category:Kurdish politicians
title: Firsat Sofi
